location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 382: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Chargé d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: In this letter Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, acknowledges the receipt of a letter from William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Chargé d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, dated 25 November, which announced that the latter had resumed diplomatic relations with the Court of the Shah. The letter in question appears as the next item in this volume (ff 18-19v).
